SELECT e.status, c.course_id, c.course_code, c.title, c.classroom, c.type, c.grade, s.year, s.semester, c.time, c.credit, c.max_std, c.rem_std, c.user_id
FROM course c JOIN enrollment e ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN semester s ON c.semester_id = s.semester_id WHERE e.user_id = #{userId} AND s.semester_id = #{semesterId} AND e.status = '수강중'
